Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.StringUtils
public final class StringUtils extends Object
This class contains utility methods for string manipulation.

  • Method Details

    • replaceLast

      public static String replaceLast(String string, String oldSubstring, String newSubstring)
      Replaces the last occurrence of a substring in a string with a new substring. For example:
      replaceLast("hellohellohello", "ello", "i") returns "hellohellohi"
      Parameters:
      string - The string that contains the substring to replace.
      oldSubstring - The substring to replace.
      newSubstring - The new substring to insert in place of the old substring.
      Returns:
      A new string with the last occurrence of the old substring replaced.

    • toCharacterList

      public static List<Character> toCharacterList(String string)
      Given a string, returns a list of characters in the string.
      Parameters:
      string - The string from which to extract characters.
      Returns:
      The list of characters in the string.

    • toString

      public static String toString(List<Character> letters)
      Returns a string with all the characters in the list concatenated together.
      Parameters:
      letters - List of characters.
      Returns:
      A string containing all the characters concatenated together.

    • getListContents

      public static String getListContents(List<?> list)
      Gets the contents of a list of objects (strings, integers, etc.).
      Parameters:
      list - The list of objects.
      Returns:
      A string displaying the contents of a list.

    • get2dArrayContents

      public static <E> String get2dArrayContents(E[][] array)
      Returns a string representing the contents of the given 2D array in a readable format.
      Type Parameters:
      E - The type of the items in the 2D array.
      Parameters:
      array - The 2D array to print.
      Returns:
      A string representing the contents of the given 2D array.

    • get2dArrayContents

      public static String get2dArrayContents(List<?> list)
      Given a list of 2D arrays of objects, returns a string representing the contents of each 2D array in a readable format.
      Parameters:
      list - List of 2D arrays of objects.
      Returns:
      A string representing the contents of each 2D array of objects.

    • getContents

      public static String getContents(List<String> strings, boolean shouldSort)
      Returns the contents of the given list as a string. Good for debugging.
      Parameters:
      strings - A list of strings.
      shouldSort - True to sort the list in alphabetical order before retrieving its contents, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The contents of the given list.
